name: BetMonitor
header: Custom Software for a Gambling Operator
description:
A tool built for office staff containing a bet feed, live betting pattern analysis, daily/monthly reporting and various QOL utilities for daily tasks.

It now performs a vital role in the company for in-house traders, giving them quick information and assistance at a glance.

Uses Pipedrive, Google and internal API's for up to date client & compliance information, as well as live news feeds for sports events.

name: BetCalculator
header: React frontend for Betcruncher.js by Catena-Media.
description:
Working for a gambling operator, online bet calculators were regularly used work out potential returns, check payouts are correct & break down the workings of a wager for clients in customer support situations.

BetCalculator is a React frontend using MUI components for Betcruncher.js library by Catena-Media.

The tool is used by the company for quick calculations and as a learning tool for new staff.

name: PlaysTVScraper
header: Web Scraper for Plays.tv using Wayback Machine
description:
PlaysTV, a clip-sharing site for PC gaming, shut down in 2019, causing all its content to be lost. This included 195 clips uploaded by my friends and me, some of which were only accessible through the Internet Archive's Wayback Machine.

Using Selenium and BeautifulSoup, I successfully scraped and retrieved most of these clips.

name: AudioSwitcher
header: Tool to switch between two audio devices.
description:
Simple script to capture enabled audio output devices and switch to the next one in the list.

To use instead of going into Windows sound settings to switch from headphones to speakers or vice versa, and built to be keybinded.

name: BackgroundChecker
header: Bot to prevent changing of background
description:
A fun background service to prevent housemates changing the desktop wallpaper on a shared PC.

If background gets changed, it is reset to default, sends a text notification, and Rick Astley's No.1 hit opens on full volume.

name: RecipeApp
description:
An in-progress recipe sharing app using React and C#.

Built with the ambition to have an alternative to the current line up of bloated recipe websites.
Users can add, edit and delete recipes, as well as like and comment on others.

Built as a learning project.
